data.eml:eml: Taxonomic notes on the Macrocheilus Hope (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Helluonini) from Oriental Region, with description of one new species from the Philippines

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhao, Danyang, Tian, Mingyi (2012): Taxonomic notes on the Macrocheilus Hope (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Helluonini) from Oriental Region, with description of one new species from the Philippines. ZooKeys 228: 77-100, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.228.3401, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.228.3401
